prompts.question: My simple pleasures
answers: Morning coffee while the world is still quiet
Finding a new book I can't put down
Sunday farmers market trips
Cooking a meal from scratch
Sunset walks with good music

prompts.question: Typical Sunday
answers: Brunch, beach, and a good book
Gym, meal prep, and Netflix
Hiking trails and trying new cafes
Sleep in, cook breakfast, explore the city
Yoga, farmers market, and friends

prompts.question: Together, we could
answers: Find the city's best hidden speakeasies
Start a two-person book club
Learn to make pasta from scratch
Explore every museum in town
Plan spontaneous weekend road trips

prompts.question: I'll fall for you if
answers: You can make me laugh even on my worst days
You're passionate about something
You love dogs as much as I do
You're down for random adventures
You appreciate the little things in life

prompts.question: The way to win me over is
answers: Good conversation and great tacos
Be genuinely kind to everyone
Share your favorite music with me
Plan thoughtful surprises
Make me laugh until my stomach hurts

prompts.question: I'm looking for
answers: Someone who doesn't take life too seriously
A partner in crime for all adventures
Someone to share lazy Sundays with
My plus one for concerts and comedy shows
Someone who values growth and authenticity

prompts.question: This year, I really want to
answers: Travel to three new countries
Learn a new language
Run my first marathon
Start my own business
Master the art of sourdough

prompts.question: A random fact I love is
answers: Octopuses have three hearts
Honey never expires
Trees can communicate with each other
The moon is moving away from Earth
Bananas are berries but strawberries aren't

prompts.question: Dating me is like
answers: Finding money in your pocket you forgot about
A perfectly curated playlist
Your favorite comfort food
A weekend with no plans
The first day of spring

prompts.question: We'll get along if
answers: You appreciate sarcasm and dad jokes
You're always down for trying new food
You can enjoy comfortable silence
You love deep conversations at 2am
You think pineapple belongs on pizza

prompts.question: My Love Language is
answers: Quality time and good food
Acts of service and coffee runs
Words of affirmation and playlists
Physical touch and forehead kisses
All of the above, honestly

prompts.question: The dorkiest thing about me is
answers: I have a spreadsheet for everything
I know way too much about dinosaurs
I still sleep with a stuffed animal
I practice conversations in the shower
I get excited about organizing things

prompts.question: The best way to ask me out is
answers: Suggest a specific plan, not just 'hang out'
Send me a voice note instead of texting
Challenge me to mini golf
Ask me to show you my favorite coffee spot
Be direct and genuine about it

prompts.question: Two truths and a lie
answers: I've been skydiving, I speak 3 languages, I hate chocolate
I've met a celebrity, I can't swim, I've lived in 5 countries
I'm a twin, I've never broken a bone, I hate coffee
I can play guitar, I've been on TV, I'm scared of birds
I've run a marathon, I make great pasta, I love mornings

prompts.question: My greatest strength
answers: I can find humor in any situation
I'm a great listener
I never give up on people I care about
I can cook a meal from anything in the fridge
I stay calm under pressure
